title: "STA/OPR 9750 - In-Class Labs"

Most weeks, the Thursday 'lecture' for STA/OPR 9750 will be dedicated to an in-class "lab". These ungraded labs are an opportunity to see how the concepts introduced in that week's [pre-assignment](./preassigns.html) are used in practice.

Labs:

- [Lab #01](./labs/lab01.html): `R`ev your Engines! Setting-Up `R` and `RStudio`
- [Lab #02](./labs/lab02.html): Getting Down with Markdown
- [Lab #03](./labs/lab03.html): `R`, These are your first steps...
- [Lab #04](./labs/lab04.html): Single Table Verbs, Group-Aware Filtering
